title: U.S. President Trump offers to ‘destroy career’ of Texas lawmaker - National | Globalnews.ca
text:
February 7, 2017 2:16 pm Updated: February 7, 2017 2:49 pm U.S. President Trump offers to ‘destroy career’ of Texas lawmaker By Staff Reuters 
WATCH ABOVE: In a meeting with sheriffs from around the country, U.S. President Donald Trump offered to destroy the career of a Texas state senator. What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' editorial staff without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... X What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - 
Trump made the comments during a White House meeting with sheriffs from around the country. 
WATCH: Trump says meeting with sheriffs a page out of Bill Belichick playbook 
When Rockwall County Sheriff Harold Eavenson told Trump the state senator wanted to make it tougher for law enforcement to obtain control of assets forfeited by drug traffickers, Trump responded, “Do you want to give his name? We’ll destroy his career.” 
The people in the room laughed and Eavenson declined to identify the state senator. Related
